testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to Bookit API as a teacher and user sends GET request to "/api/clusters/my".passed Then status code should be 200..............................................passed And content type is "application/json"......................................passed And id is 11235.............................................................passed And name is "dark-side".....................................................passed And first element of nameArray is "kilimanjaro".............................passed
